data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Shaoguan, Guangdong, China with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shaoguan, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 77,280 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Shaoguan, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 77,280 believers in Shaoguan against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Biao Mien people.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Shaoguan. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Shaoguan, Guangdong, China.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Shaoguan, Guangdong, China has a population of 1,018,700.

We estimate Shaoguan has 77,280 people who might know Jesus, 16,457 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 924,963 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Shaoguan, Guangdong, China to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
